gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowInvestmentActivities` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_CashFlowInvestmentActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_CashFlowInvestmentActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestmentActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowPensionActivities` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashFlowPensionActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashFlowPensionActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowPensionActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetCashFlows` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_NetCashFlows')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_NetCashFlows return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfNetCashFlowsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
